subject: Mental Health
title: The Youth Depression Crisis
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Youth Depression Crisis.

hook.text: Teen depression has surged 60 percent in the past decade. Something changed.

buildup.text: Smartphones, social media, and academic pressure collided with developing brains.

discovery.text: Girls are hit hardest, with rates climbing three times faster than boys.

twist.text: Most teens who need help never receive it due to stigma and access barriers.

climax.text: Schools are now frontline mental health providers in many communities.

punchline.text: A generation is struggling, and the adults are just noticing.

quiz.question: How much has teen depression increased in the past decade?
